item.title: Command wont work
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup")  && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Nathan L 05") || playerRights >= 1)) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
					if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Oh cmon you can type better then that! ");
				}

item.title: Command wont work
item.dc:creator: @heybaby05 heybaby05
item.description:
@heybaby05 wrote:

ok i got this command for pickup and here it is but it wont let my admins or mods pickup plz tell me why…
}
else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Nathan L 05”) || playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}
